name: Guy Who Sucks At Being A Person Sees Huge Potential In AI

content.html: “Just yesterday, I asked an AI program to write an entire sci-fi novel for me, and [as someone who will die an empty shell of a man who wasted his life doing nothing for the world and, perhaps, should never have been born] I was super impressed.” #AI
